title: Holiday Mode anyone?
body:
In Bangkok at the moment, trying to level an oce account... 400ping is slightly annoying {{summoner:3}} .

Thought of a cool idea, given the multiple other servers... with nice, local, low pings.

Holiday Mode {{summoner:12}} 
Short term server transfer for 'holiday' use when overseas
Could maintain link to home server for RP/skins/chat/etc, but utilise local queues and servers
Option 1: 1 'free' holiday per season
Option 2: IP purchasable time on a different server... maybe 150IP per day (first win of the day amount)
Option 3: RP purchase (not keen on this one... though a significant discount on the full transfer would be ok i guess)
Could put a maximum 'holiday' time per season as a limit.
Could put all 3 options as available... like for champs (free rotation, IP option, RP option)

Benefits
Would encourage people to play when on holiday... = more $$ for rito (win/win) 
Less people creating accounts just for overseas use... ??

Problems
?Server overload for common holiday destinations... is that possible?
Sure there will be $$ compensation required by receiving server... though if reciprocal arrangements could be made it should be fine, right?

Thoughts?
